Description: • Conduct research and analysis on potential real estate investment opportunities, including market analysis, financial analysis, and due diligence• Assist in conducting feasibility and high and best-use studies to identify and maximize the value of real estate assets• Collaborate with team members to evaluate, and prepare financial models, cash flow projections, sensitivity analyses, and other important matrixes depending on the task• Assist with the management of real estate assets, including property management, lease negotiation, and tenant• Prepare reports, memos, and presentations for internal and external stakeholders• Develop and maintain project schedules and• Stay up-to-date on market trends, valuation standards, investment opportunities, and regulatory changes in the real estate industrySkills
Skills: • Master's degree in Real Estate, Finance, Business Administration, or a related
• 1-2 years of experience in real estate investment, asset management, or related fields. Prior experience working with Big 4 companies will be an added advantage
• Strong analytical skills, including experience with Excel modeling
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office and real estate industry databases and software (e.g. Argus)
• Knowledge of real estate financing and capital markets
